title: On a Model of Associative Memory with Huge Storage Capacity

tldr.text: With this interaction, Krotov and Hopfield's generalized version of the well-known Hopfield model of associative memory has an exponential storage capacity in the number of neurons, yet the basins of attraction are almost as large as in the standard Hopfields.
